alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 7:59PM CDT until October 05 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WISE...JACK...NORTHWESTERN PARKER AND NORTHEASTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 758 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Jacksboro to near Fort Richardson State Park to near Graford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Ping-pong ball sized hail reported 4 miles south of Jacksboro. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Bridgeport, Jacksboro, Alvord, Chico, Graford, Poolville, Paradise, Cool, Lake Mineral Wells, Fort Richardson State Park, Runaway Bay, Millsap, Perrin, Lake Bridgeport, Adell, Advance, Salesville, and Cundiff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
